content: > need practice seaming looking for something anything within your skill level that isn t rectangular trying to find something to work on that you don t have to think about this attractive little pillow is just what you ve been searching for simple shapes are sewn together to form a soft heart shape that makes a perfect accent for valentine s day or any day that you want to say i love you i ve also discovered that this pillow is the perfect size to wedge between your head and your shoulder if you re trying to get some sleep in a sitting position make one for your favorite frequent flyer now that s love
